Eduardo Prud'homme is a Partner at Gadex: Energy Intelligence, specializing in structural analysis of Mexico's natural gas and power markets. With a unique blend of experience as a former pipeline network operator and deep expertise in ratemaking and regulatory economics, Eduardo provides data-driven insights into infrastructure, system operations, tariffs, and market design. When he's not building quantitative models or writing analytical content, he enjoys cycling and walking with his Labrador and Border Collie.
